biotools.summary:
Network-based R-statistics for (unbalanced) longitudinal samples.

Index of /web/packages/NBR/vignettes.

Here are the scripts and preprocessed data to illustrate the R package NBR using the dataset SWU-SLIM.

Network-Based R-Statistics using Mixed Effects Models.
